title: Austin, U.S.A Four Seasons Hotel Austin Rocks Austin City Limits with New OfferingsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Austin, U.S.A Four Seasons Hotel Austin Rocks Austin City Limits with New Offerings
Thousands of music-lovers and hundreds of bands are set to converge in Austin next month as the annual Austin City Limits Music Festival kicks off in Texas’ effortlessly cool capital city.
Taking place October 2-4 and 9-11, 2015, the annual festival virtually consumes the city with bands playing morning through night two weekends in a row at Zilker Park and around town at a variety of venues.
Whether a first-time festival goer or a seasoned veteran, attendees can travel like the rock stars they’re here to see with a new Austin City Limits Weekend package at Four Seasons Hotel Austin, detoxifying spa treatments and the return of the Hotel’s popular live broadcast on the back lawn.
Austin City Limits Weekend Package
Located in the heart of downtown and within walking distance of the concert grounds, Four Seasons welcomes this year’s music fans with a value-added package featuring luxurious accommodations, cocktails in the Lobby Lounge, overnight parking and late 2:00 pm check-out on Sunday.
The package is available both weekends starting at USD 630 per night, double occupancy. To check availability, travellers should call Reservations at 512 685 8100 or book online.
Detox in The Spa
Long days and non-stop partying at night can take a toll on the body. Enter the Pura Vida Detoxifying Body Treatment in The Spa, complete with an anti-inflammatory desert clay body mask – infused with rosemary, grapefruit, juniper and thyme – and a full-body essential oil massage that cleanses the skin and rejuvenates the mind.
For those who need an extra shot of energy, the European-inspired lemon and espresso oil in the La Delgada Slimming Body Wrap detoxifies and firms at the same time, leaving guests looking and feeling like new.
Source: -Four Seasons Hotel
